item.description:
NEW YEAR'S TOUR OF SICILY
December 26 - January 4
- 8 nights in Sicily
- Daily Breakfast
- Excursions: Palermo, Monreale, Agrigento, Taormina

- Licensed Local Tour Guides to All these Cities & Sites
- Welcome Dinner - New Year's Eve Dinner - by my Dad Loris
- Cooking Class: Eggplant Parmigiana - by my Mom Gina
- Sicilian Wine & Cheese Tasting
- Private Transportation
- Professional Bilingual, native of Italy Tour Director, myself

$ 1,950 + airfare; $ 100 off if you sign up by October 31, 2011

For more details:
Elsa Gramola - A Taste of Italy in Austin

elsa@atasteofitalyinaustin.com
Italy Tours | Italian Language | Cooking Classes
www.ATasteOfItalyInAustin.com
